mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_children ( userId, name, birthdate, regDate, delYn ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{name}, #{birthdate}, #{regDate}, #{delYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT idx, userId, name, birthdate, regDate, delYn FROM t_children WHERE userId = #{userId} AND delYn = 'N' ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_children SET name = #{name}, birthdate = #{birthdate} WHERE idx = #{idx} AND userId = #{userId} AND delYn = 'N'
UPDATE t_children SET delYn = 'Y' WHERE idx = #{idx} AND userId = #{userId}
